content: Thank you for the message, Jay! I like your thinking and I sometimes wonder that too! I live on a one way street, the drivers often need to drive around to get me even though they are at the street corner — this usually annoys me during rush hour. We can call or text the driver in that scenario (I usually call), but it would be useful if I can just tap on their location pin and send a signal to tell the driver to just wait there instead. There’s a lot to look forward. I’m sure by doing more user research and testing, they’ll gain better understanding of user needs and implement new features with greater ease of use.
